timeline.bodyText: I think it should be if(Matchmaker) right? This is needed though I think. Can u check this?
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: Yea that's what I'm thinking too. We could just get rid of the init mode entirely, and always use autolobby for matchmaker games
replies.author: Askaholic

replies.bodyText: Yes can u do so @Askaholic and then I merge this...
replies.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: So I looked into this, the problem is we didn't add game_type to the game_launch message, so it's not available in this function. I think it's ok to have the extra check for ladder game mode since it would only apply if for some reason the server didn't send the init mode (shouldn't happen, but it doesn't really hurt to have the code in there).
replies.author: Askaholic

timeline.message: Check game_type instead of featured mod everywhere
Add TODO for getting rid of init_mode in game_launch mesage
